channel.title: union square on courtside nyc
channel.description: Recent content in union square on courtside nyc

item.title: singlish
item.description: thoughts bar tender was so nice and lovely to chat with :) space is tiny so def need resy menu highlights they’ve got some really nice whiskey

item.title: bobwhite counter
item.description: thoughts iconic menu highlights everything chicken caesar if you’re trying to be “healthy” but bffr if that’s your thought process. this is fried chicken.

item.title: tompkin's square bagels
item.description: thoughts three locations, two in EV - orginal on avenue a, second on 2nd avenue, newest location in union square avenue a location is the best absolute classic, iykyk
